extendedInfo.description: A Theme based on the Laughing Man character from Ghost In The Shell*Glassy Icons with blue tint**Works for all screen resolutions**Custom design**More icons in iconpack**I Will continue to add icons and include them within the iconpack.More are available on request. Contact me if you have any problems. *If you like it please rate*NOTE: This ADW THEME requires the "ADW.LAUNCHER" app to use it.TO INSTALL:Make sure you are running ADW.LAUNCHER, press Menu-ADWSettings-Themes Preferences and select ADWTheme Laughing_man - Glass. check theme iconsTIPS: I will continue to update icons, in the meantime, hit menu while in the app draw and use groups to seperate themed icons from non-themed icons.  I also like to use fancy widget with the background canvas  transparency set very low
